comments.body: Oh, `appear?: number` is missing in this `timeout` definition, but I think it should be added on another PR. 😅
FYI. If the PR https://github.com/reactjs/react-transition-group/pull/469 is merged, it would need to update the definition.

In case https://github.com/reactjs/react-transition-group/pull/469 is merged a lot of the stuff in this PR will be obsolute, and can be removed (the change will be a single line one - adding the `nodeRef` prop). At any rate, it would be introduced in a new version of `react-transition-group` (and a breaking one, see https://github.com/reactjs/react-transition-group/pull/469#issue-260515743), so we can always do that in `@types/react-transition-group@5.0.0` whenever that's merged. In the meantime though, 4.4.0 has no type definitions that are properly typed, so I think this PR is still relevant.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@    RefElement,
    (node: HTMLElement, isAppearing: boolean) => void,
    (isAppearing: boolean) => void
>;
